post:
Hello LES people,


Let's introduce some good Singapore KVM deals before rules kick IN!
As Ant mentioned limits be placed back in sometime (that is still 2 hrs to go) ..

<br>

> **VPS-KVM4G SG Preorder** - The popular guy
> 4GB DDR4 ECC RAM
> 40GB NVMe SSD RAID1 disk
> 2vCPU CoffeeLake E2276G @3.7+ Ghz
> 1 IPv4 + 1TB transfer @ 1Gbps
> [Just £15.6 per 3 months recurring - Singapore - Click here to order](https://my.webhorizon.in/order/config/index/vps/?group_id=12&pricing_id=309)

<br>

> **VPS-2G Preorder** - notitle?
> 2GB DDR4 ECC RAM
> 20GB NVMe SSD RAID1 disk
> 1vCPU CoffeeLake E2276G @3.7+Ghz
> 1 IPv4 + 500gb transfer @ 1Gbps
> [Just £21/year recurring - Singapore - Click here to order](https://my.webhorizon.in/order/config/index/vps/?group_id=12&pricing_id=308)

<br>

> **VPS-1G Preorder** - The small one
> 1GB DDR4 ECC RAM
> 10GB NVMe SSD RAID1 disk
> 1vCPU CoffeeLake E2276G @3.7+Ghz
> 1 IPv4 + 250gb transfer @ 1Gbps
> [Just £15.5/year recurring - Singapore - Click here to order](https://my.webhorizon.in/order/config/index/vps/?group_id=12&pricing_id=307)

<br>

> **VPS-KVM6G SG Preorder** - The mega guy, best value for money
> 6GB DDR4 ECC RAM
> 60GB NVMe SSD RAID1 disk
> 3vCPU CoffeeLake E2276G @3.7+ Ghz
> 1 IPv4 + 1.5TB transfer @ 1Gbps
> [Just £20.3 per 3 months recurring - Singapore - Click here to order](https://my.webhorizon.in/order/config/index/vps/?group_id=12&pricing_id=311)

<br>
1. *Are these KVM VPS ?*
Yes, these are KVM VPS.

2. *What are the OS options?*
We currently have Ubuntu, Debian & CentOS options available in the control panel, custom ISO are installable via ticket.

3. *Is IPv6 enabled?*
IPv6 is not supported on this server right now, however you can always use a IPv6 tunnel broker like HE.
Plans to implement IPv6 in the near future.

4. *When will these be provisioned?*
These VPS should be provisioned by 6th December, most probably earlier.

5. *A test IP/looking glass?*
IP: 131.153.46.141
[1GB test file](http://131.153.46.141/SIN-1GB.test)

<br>
Any other questions? Please ask here or PM is fine too ☺️ 
All prices are recurring
@AnthonySmith please remove this thread if anything seems wrong.
<br>
Regards,
Abdullah
